name: JJ's Space Adventure
description:
You might have to reload if it shows a black screen for a while

Keyboard controls:

     wasd or arrow keys to move

     space or enter to shoot

     F to open shop

Controller controls:

     Start to open shop

     D-pad or left stick to move

     Bottom button (A or B depending on controller) to shoot

     LB to erase save data while in menu

You are JJ. JJ is the most amazing person ever and went to Doctor Samuel to help make the world a better place by cloning yourself. The experiment went wrong and all the clones and JJ were blasted into space and got powers. Most of the clones are angry and want revenge for being blasted into space and want to destroy the earth. You must kill all of the evil clones with the help of the few good clones.
